trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure serialization by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Gère les éléments XML utilisés pour configurer la sérialisation par le <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) group, which contains the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) element, specifically, to allow the addition of types to the collection of known types.
trans-unit.target: Cette classe est utilisée pour gérer les [ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) groupe qui contient le [ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) élément, plus précisément, pour autoriser l’ajout de types à la collection de types connus.

trans-unit.source: For more information about data contract known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations sur les types connus de contrat de données, consultez [Types connus de contrat de données](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the element to add to the known types collection, see [<declaredTypes>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour obtenir un exemple d’utilisation de l’élément à ajouter à la collection de types connus, consultez [ <declaredTypes>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> used to set up the known types collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> utilisé pour configurer la collection de types connus.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> used for the serialization configuration section.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> utilisé pour la section de configuration de la sérialisation.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> that represents the configuration to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> qui représente la configuration à récupérer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the serialization configuration section for the specified configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la section de configuration de la sérialisation pour la configuration spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> that represents the configuration section.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> qui représente la section de configuration.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.NetDataContractSerializerSection" /> used to set up the known types collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.NetDataContractSerializerSection" /> utilisé pour configurer la collection de types connus.
